name: Cog
description: A hackathon hardware check-out system by HackMIT

DEBUG.description: Toggle Flask debug mode. Should always be False in production

FORCE_SSL.description: Toggle force SSL. Only takes affect if DEBUG=False

ENABLE_WAITLIST.description: If True, lets users make requests even if item is out of stock

LOTTERY_REQUIRES_PROPOSAL.description: If True, requires hackers to submit a proposal for lotteried items

CLOSE_LOTTERY_WHEN_RUN.description: If True, item type is set to CHECKOUT after an item's lottery is run

DENY_LOTTERY_LOSERS.description: If True, deny lottery requests that don't win item

LOTTERY_CHAR_LIMIT.description: Character limit for lottery proposals, set to 0 to disable char limit

DISPLAY_LOTTERY_QUANTITY.description: If True, display current lottery item stock to user

DISPLAY_CHECKOUT_QUANTITY.description: If True, display current checkout item stock to user

LOTTERY_MULTIPLE_SUBMISSIONS.description: If False, prevent users from submitting multiple requests for same lottery item

LOTTERY_TEXT.description: The info text underneath the 'Lottery Required' section
LOTTERY_TEXT.value: We have a limited quantity of these items. Please fill out a brief proposal describing your project idea, and we'll randomly accept as many requests as we can 30 minutes after hacking starts.

CHECKOUT_TEXT.description: The info text underneath the 'Checkout Required' section
CHECKOUT_TEXT.value: Click to request any of these items, and your request will be approved when we have one available. Keep in mind we will ask to hold on to a form of ID until the item is returned.

FREE_TEXT.description: The info text underneath the 'No Checkout Required' section
FREE_TEXT.value: Just come to the hardware desk and ask for any of these items!

MLH_TEXT.description: The info text underneath the 'MLH Item' section
MLH_TEXT.value: You need to check these items out through MLH Hardware
